text: Tumhi sanga, he allaha! He sarya jagaca svami! Tu jyala icchito rajya pradana karato ani jyacyakaduna icchito rajya hiravuna gheto ani tu jyala icchito mana-pratistha pradana karato ani jyala icchito apamanita karato. Tujhya hati sarva bhala'i ahe. Nihsansaya, tu pratyeka gostica samarthya balagato
